line.text: 'Fox 1 missiles require a lock. They are not heatseeker. They can only be intercepted by CCDS MK1.'
'Fox 2 missiles do not require a lock. They are heatseeker. They can only be intercepted by CCDS MK2.'
'Fox 3 missiles do not require a lock. They are not heatseeker. They can only be intercepted by CCDS MK3.'
'Artillery missiles are unguided. They cannot be intercepted.'
'All missiles can be destroyed by conventional guns. Fox missiles are much more resistant.'

sval.val: Fox 1 missiles require a lock. They are not heatseeker. They can only be intercepted by CCDS MK1.
Fox 2 missiles do not require a lock. They are heatseeker. They can only be intercepted by CCDS MK2.
Fox 3 missiles do not require a lock. They are not heatseeker. They can only be intercepted by CCDS MK3.
Artillery missiles are unguided. They cannot be intercepted.
All missiles can be destroyed by conventional guns. Fox missiles are much more resistant.
